contents.title: Diversification to Protect Wealth from Investment Risks
contents.description: Risk affects the performance of the investment portfolio. At The Family Office, we design an investment strategy for the client based on a questionnaire that determines risks

contents.title: The Economic Situation in China
contents.description: We have been reading from the beginning bad news about China, but the country’s economy keeps growing and is today the second largest economy in the world. China’s economy is also expected to surpass the US economy.

contents.title: Investing Deposits
contents.description: Safe is comfortable, but what is the result of comfort? When savers do not invest their deposits, the bank does. They only benefit if they are shareholders in the bank and will be harmed otherwise. Investment is not a choice.

contents.title: Best Return Rates for Investors
contents.description: We have been telling investors since the beginning and for 17 years that they must accept returns between 6% and 8% to preserve their wealth with minimum risk, and that an average of 7% means that their capital will double every 10 years.

contents.title: Investment Plan at The Family Office
contents.description: We spared no effort from the beginning to find solutions for investors based on the information we acquire when we analyze the economies and markets of the world. We are committed to the duty entrusted to us and we shall persist in our policy.

contents.title: Shariah-Compliant Investments at The Family Office
contents.description: Shariah-compliant investment solutions differ from one company to the other. At The Family Office, 55% of our clients invest in deals that are approved by our Shariah panel.

contents.title: Outlook for the GCC and the World Following Economic and Investment Transformations
contents.description: The GCC region is doing well and is blessed with its oil wealth, financial wealth that was amassed over the years, and human assets with 70% of the young generation less than 30 years old.

title: Abdulmohsin AlOmran | A Deep-Dive Into Diversification, Retirement, And Asset Protection In Wealth Management
description: During a webinar held on 6 October, The Family Office Founder and CEO Abdulmohsin Al Omran discussed with Mohammed Albaz, Bahrain Bureau Senior Reporter at Sky News Arabia, rising inflation after the Covid-19 pandemic, investment horizons in the region, asset allocation, etc.
